page.title: 08Yeovil Bus Station.
page.content: { Bus transport in the area runs about {50 services,}the last one at night finishes at 11:30p.m.About 40 to 50 buses run through the Yeovil Bus Station in a day.This station has 20 buses and coaches,they have 2 double deckers and 1 woman driver.Bus conductors are no longer needed because there are now modern computers.The drivers work between 8 and 10 hours a day,but no more than 10 hours on different schedules.The age they retire is 65 and most of the drivers enjoy their job. In Yeovil town,15 buses run a day.Around the outskirts of the town,and in the main centre,buses run every 30 to 40 minutes. The Inspector has a licence to drive a bus.He gives out the wages on a Thursday and he enjoys his job.
